Add as friend Send Msg Portillo's tulips500 March 18, 2007 4.0 4.0 star rating +5 1 +5 5 Votes quick, casual lunches
if you’ve been to one portillo’s, you’ve been to them all. offering a more refined take on fast food, portillo’s offers hot dogs, hamburgers, salads, and sandwiches in a nice, but casual dining environment. i like coming here for quick lunches. be careful during rush hour times though, it can get pretty crowded, but the lines seem to move fast.
Dishes I tried:
Char-Broiled Chicken Sandwich
5.0 star rating
chicken wasn’t dry at all, but rather moist and tasty. maybe b/c i was hungry, but for a chicken sandwich, this was quite good. Link To Review
